lead_paragraph: The fall-out from Aston Villa's Premier League relegation continued on Friday when caretaker manager Eric Black revealed that defender Jores Okore is refusing to play for club.

headline.print_headline: Okore Boycott Adds More Salt to Villa Wounds
headline.main: Okore Boycott Adds More Salt to Villa Wounds

snippet: The fall-out from Aston Villa's Premier League relegation continued on Friday when caretaker manager Eric Black revealed that defender Jores Okore is refusing to play for club....
